Detailed Description

Offers the application, with wxExtension specific init and exit.

It also keeps the locale and the catalog dir. Your application should be derived from this class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual int wxExApp::OnExit (  )  [virtual]

This deletes all global objects and cleans up things if necessary.

You should normally don't need to override it.

virtual bool wxExApp::OnInit (  )  [virtual]

Constructs the config, and initializes the locale.

In your class OnInit first set the app name, as it uses this name for the config, and then call this base class method.
